price: 70. Saaxirintii waxay ula dhaceen dhulka sujuud10.Waxay yidhaadeen: Waxaan rumeynay Rabbiga Haaruun iyo Muuse.”
arabic: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ
footnotes: 10. Kaddib markay arkeen mucjisooyinka uu Alle siiyey Muuse iyo inay yihiin xaqiiq oo aysan ahayn moodsiin sixir.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-ul'qiya al-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wamūsā
